solution_line_template: The birds eat this many tomatoes: {total_tomatoes} / {fraction_denominator} = <<{total_tomatoes}/{fraction_denominator}={eaten_tomatoes}>>{eaten_tomatoes} tomatoes.
There are this many tomatoes left on the plant: {total_tomatoes} - {eaten_tomatoes} = <<{total_tomatoes}-{eaten_tomatoes}={remaining_tomatoes}>>{remaining_tomatoes} tomatoes.
